column4: hi there. ubuntu 10.04, when i do an apt-get upgrade or dist-upgrade  libboost-filesystem-dev libboost-graph-dev libboost-serialization-dev are kept back - any idea why? i got no apt preferences for this set
they're kept back because they didn't do well in school
ah! clearly! apt-cache policy seems to suggest otherwise though
on a more serious note, perhaps it has something to do with dependencies?
